name: eyebus
author: Christine Yu
description: Translink's Next Bus feature is useful but really slow. Let this add-on automatically search for the next arrival time of your next Vancouver area bus, when you start Firefox and display it to you in the Add-ons bar. Refresh interval can be set in preferences.

preferences.description: Time before refreshing next TransLink bus time
preferences.name: refreshInterval
preferences.title: Refresh Interval (minutes)
